body: Damn he's parent sure really trust her

Its shit like this that if you let it, it will fuck with your views/how you view women, be careful or you will be a piece of shit that would rather die a virgin than to fuck a non-virgin experienced women just because you want to "own her", dont be a piece of trash, a human being cant own another human being unless its human traficking and thats illegal, im saying this because i almost let this change my views of the opposite sex unconciously and i admit its my fault, thankfully i stopped this shit on time.

This is directed to whatever people that might be going thru an existential crisis because of japans hentai/anime obsession with virginity. (Most of the shit i see is like this including visual novels) deflowering and impregnation i mean.

Btw im just typing what i truly feel after reading this doujin, dunno if whoever reads this will find it a meme but this doujin helped me realise shit, no joke.
